overview: The author of this film is Mohammad Rahmati. The film tells the story of a woman who has to use drugs to carry drugs. A woman named Soheila has been sentenced to prison for committing a crime. But Soheila is pregnant and goes home with two agents on the day of her trial, She is supposed to take some drugs so that he can take them to prison, She has problems along the way.The story of the film Deformity deals with the category of drugs and their sale and purchase Drugs that endanger the lives of many people so that they can be easily transported through these people
title: Bi Rikhti
